archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.5c: c) coordinating with internal and external stakeholders (e.g. the SOC, executive management, line management, the media, external interest groups and forums, suppliers and clients)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
